recipes.name: Spanish Chorizo and Potato Stew
recipes.instructions: Heat olive oil, add chopped onion, garlic, and chorizo. Stir in bell pepper & potatoes. Season with smoked paprika, salt, and pour in stock. Simmer until potatoes are tender.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with Parmesan. Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture off heat. Season with black pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add curry powder and tomatoes. Stir in chicken and cook until browned. Pour coconut milk and simmer until chicken is fully cooked.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger, then toss in vegetables. Stir fry for 3–5 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook until veggies are tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic. Stir in taco seasoning. Serve in warm tortillas with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
